author: Scott Adam Gordon
title: Deal: Samsung Gear VR $53 on Amazon (down from $95)
text:
If this week’s Google Daydream VR sale isn’t the right VR deal for you, perhaps this reduction on Samsung’s Gear VR headset might be more interesting.
The 2nd generation (latest) Samsung Gear VR is on sale at Amazon for $52.51, down from the previous $94.99 price (Samsung offers it from its own store for $99.99). The offer comes from third-party sellers but is ‘Fulfilled by Amazon,’ meaning you’re covered by Amazon should you have any problems or wish to return it.
The Samsung Gear VR was built in partnership with Oculus and is used in conjunction with a Samsung phone to deliver 360-degree gaming and entertainment. It’s compatible with the following handsets:
Galaxy S7 Galaxy S7 Edge Galaxy Note 5 Galaxy S6 Galaxy S6 Edge Galaxy S6 Edge+ The Gear VR on sale is the ‘International’ version, which in this case means that the packaging/manuals may not be in English. However, there are no functional/compatibility differences between the US and International models.
If you want to pick one up, visit the Samsung Gear VR Amazon page , tap on the ‘Used & new’ purchase options, and scroll down until you see the $52.51 fulfilled by Amazon units.
